30 SUSQUEHANNA RiIVER BRIDGE

Live Load
Same as for Two Span Continuous Truss Spans previously described.
Design for Estimate

For purposes of this report and estimate of weights this unit has been de-
signed as a cantilever with length of suspended span equal to 280 feet.
This suspended span length was purposely considered longer than is cus-
tomary, to move point of inflection nearer the main supports as would be the
case in a true continuous truss. All the stresses were calculated and members
